content.rendered: This guy has assembled his personal drone out of many smaller drones. He calls it the Swarm Manned Aerial Vehicle Multi-rotor Super Drone. It’s pretty awesome but is it really still a drone or more of a helicopter?

title.rendered: Bikers Harass the Road Before One Eats Pavement

content.rendered: This footage comes from The 2014 Ride of the Century (ROC). It’s an annual event where a ton of street riders show up to plague St. Louis, MO. Here, the bikers are running amok all over the road. Even going so far as to drive on the wrong side of the road. It’s only a matter of time before they wreck. Sure enough, as they’re running a red light, one driver has to brake hard to avoid a truck and winds up taking a wicked tumble.

title.rendered: The Rare and Incredible Lamborghini Reventon Roadster

content.rendered: Lamborghinis are rare enough to most people. However, even among the elite, the Lamborghini Reventon Roadster is rarer than rare! This is one of only 15 ever produced! We love the matte grey color and all the small enhancements to the interior and engine! Nice ride!

title.rendered: You’ll Never Believe What Falls Out of This Truck!

content.rendered: Russia is constantly proving to have the most dangerous and unpredictable roads on the planet! This woman is simply minding her own business when this semi turns in front of her. The semi was hauling some massive machinery that wasn’t tied down very well! Before she can even react, several tons of metal burst through the side of the trailer like it’s made of tissue paper.

title.rendered: Starting a 100-Year-Old Engine with a Tiger Torch

content.rendered:
This beautiful Blackstone Oil Engine was down and out until it was completely cleaned and restored. It was used over 100 years ago to help pump water from a river. Sadly, in the 20s, someone sabotaged it with explosives. It sat partially submerged for several years before being dredged up in the 90s. Someone took the effort to clean it out and re-work the insides.

Now you can see how an engine like this gets started: with a hot bulb, a blow torch and a lot of kerosene!

title.rendered: Massive Trailer Fail with a Huge Gas Tank

content.rendered:
Being able to effectively transport massive cargo is no small feat. Many transportation companies, operators, and drivers make it look simple but that’s just because they’re good at their jobs! Sometimes, workers have to make due with what they’ve got on hand. In the case of this tanker, that wound up spelling failure.

It appears that while trying to back up the sheer size of the gas tank fell over to the ground and brought the whole rig with it. The weight of the tank even wrenches the trailer out from under it and sends it bending itself into the air! It looks like there’s a leak in the tank at the end but we think it might just be a hydraulic system that blew a seal.

title.rendered: Pull Your Kid’s Next Tooth with a Mini Bike

content.rendered:
Everyone remembers the old trick to pulling teeth. You tie some floss around the tooth and the other end to a door knob, then slam it shut. This method involving a mini bike might be slightly more effective. Even if it’s not, it’s definitely much more fun!

Jackass star Dave England films his daughter helping his son remove one of his first teeth with a little help from a speedy mini bike!

title.rendered: A Chrome Wrapped Lamborghini Aventador

content.rendered: Team Salamone is known for crafting some pretty unique mods and stylish body work layouts. They work best with Lamborghinis, specifically Aventadors. title.rendered: The Most Perfectly Timed Taser EVER

content.rendered: This woman looks like she’s about to start a riot! She picks up a club and goes for the kill on a police car’s rear window. She’s inches away from crushing it when an off-camera taser hits her and she falls straight over. It stops her right in her tracks!

title.rendered: Police Arrive Just in Time to Stop Carjacking

content.rendered: This body cam video from a police officer is amazing and intense! An elderly couple in a church parking lot was being carjacked by a lone man when this cop drove up on the scene. After ignoring the cop and attempting to drive away, he gets a taste of the taser. He’s immediately cuffed at which point he can’t stop crying and saying he’s sorry. But really, we all know he’s only sorry he got caught!

title.rendered: GTR A12 Vs. Bugatti Veyron Vitesse

content.rendered: A Bugatti is one helluva car to challenge to a race. There aren’t a ton of other vehicles that can easily stand shoulder to shoulder to it, especially if it’s a Veyron Vitesse. However, a Nissan GT-R with an Alpha Performance 12 package (just over 1,200 HP) might stand a chance!

title.rendered: Shelby GT500 Fails Burnout and Clips Crowd

content.rendered:
It’s important to always look as flashy as possible when pulling away from a car show. Maybe try to launch off a burnout or something similarly awesome. What’s also important is to avoid running people over.

No one informed this Mustang driver who left a show in his Shelby Cobra. He tried to gun it on the turn. Instead of looking cool, he swerved onto the curb and into a crowd of spectators!

title.rendered: Hellcats Troll a Z06 Corvette Stingray

content.rendered:
Two of today’s most beloved American racing machines are the Corvette Z06 Stingray and the Dodge Hellcat. But what happens when the two go head-to-head?

From Mexico, this footage shows one Hellcat filming another taking on the Stingray. The Hellcat seems to pull away easily enough but that’s before the police show up and spoil all the fun!

title.rendered: Coal Rolling Semis Race in Russia!

content.rendered: You’ve seen truck drag racing. Maybe you’ve even seen semi truck drag racing. Better yet, what if those trucks were diesel-guzzling, coal-rolling, exhaust-belching monsters? Well, that’s how they race their semis in Russia!

title.rendered: Genius Trailer Design For Lowered Cars!

content.rendered: As we all know, lowered cars can prove a little troublesome when loading onto a trailer. This guy has developed a solution. It’s a custom trailer he’s built from scratch that works with an airbag system to raise and lower the trailer to more easily accommodate lowered cars!  Pretty cool!

category.description: Random, sometimes shocking, and usually for the lulz

title.rendered: We Bet You Can’t Ride This Bike

content.rendered:
They say some skills are never forgotten, like riding a bike. This bike, however, will totally change that!  Check it out…we bet you couldn’t ride it either.

These engineers made a simple change. The handlebars and front tire turn in opposite directions.  It’s a slight change but it’s enough to trick your brain!

title.rendered: The Most Expensive Fire You’ll See Today

content.rendered: This poor Lamborghini Gallardo had just left a service center in South Delhi, India when something sparked in the engine and the whole thing went up in a blaze. The driver escaped in time and was unharmed (wallet, not-so-much). While there’s no definitive reason why the fire broke out, all signs point to some kind of oil leak that caught the blaze.
